page.title: 15CHILDRENS SPORTS ACTIVITIES
page.content:
TENNIS The tennis club is taken by Mr.Baum It is split up into two groups one for the beginners and one for the people who can hit the ball but just need to pratise.The first group meets from 5 till 6 and the second group meets from 6 to 7.There are 10 people in the first group and 25 people in the second.It is on every Saturday.
CRICKET Mr.Watkins takes cricket every Friday. It is not a very big club only 7 people go.It goes on from 6.30 to 8.30 and we bat in pairs.There is also a men's team.On Saturday the good players play and on Sunday the not so good players play.The cup matches are in the week.
